item.title: 危机持续，中国酝酿新的房地产刺激计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国正在考虑采取新的措施来扭转房地产市场陷入困境的局面，因为人们越来越担心，房地产行业的进一步疲软将有可能破坏中国金融体系的稳定。【原文：China is considering new measures to turn around its struggling property market, as concerns mount that a further weakening of the sector will threaten to destabilize its financial system, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 麦哲伦股价下跌，全球股票主管在调查中辞职
item.description: 麦哲伦金融集团（Magellan Financial Group Ltd.）全球股票主管阿尔维德-斯特莱曼（Arvid Streimann）周三因涉嫌工作关系被调查而辞职，该公司股价创下七个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Magellan Financial Group Ltd.’s stock fell the most in seven months after its head of global equities Arvid Streimann resigned on Wednesday amid a probe into an alleged workplace relationship.】

item.title: 日本木原说他看到了令人担忧的日元单边突然走势
item.description: 日本内阁官房长官表示，日元正在经历令人担忧的突然单向波动，需要密切关注。【原文：The yen is experiencing sudden, one-way movements that are concerning and which require close monitoring, Japan’s chief cabinet secretary said.】

item.title: 亿万富翁支持的印度印度银行计划在调查后进行全面整顿
item.description: 印度最大的非国有贷款机构之一 IndusInd 银行有限公司正准备进行一次全面改革，旨在提高盈利能力和改善业绩不佳的状况，其新任首席执行官在治理结构调整后寻求提高资产回报率。【原文：IndusInd Bank Ltd., one of India’s largest non-state owned lenders, is preparing a sweeping overhaul aimed at boosting profitability and cleaning up underperformance, as its new chief executive officer seeks to boost return on assets following a governance shakeup.】

item.title: 印度婚介公司 Shaadi.com 据称将考虑 IPO
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，当地热门婚介服务 Shaadi.com 的运营商 People Interactive India Pvt.【原文：People Interactive India Pvt., operator of the popular local marriage matchmaking service Shaadi.com, is preparing for an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国铜价飙升后旺季需求下降
item.description: 随着中国制造业的繁忙期接近尾声，铜消费却令人大失所望，铜加工企业的生产率跌至多年来的最低点。【原文：As the busy period for Chinese manufacturing draws to a close, copper consumption has largely disappointed, with run rates at fabricators plumbing multiyear lows for the season.】

item.title: 日元下跌后日本央行董事会成员暗示有可能在 12 月加息
item.description: 在日元汇率创下约 10 个月以来的最低水平后，日本央行董事会成员小田顺子（Junko Koeda）指出了正常化的必要性，从而发出了最快可能在下个月加息的信号。【原文：Bank of Japan board member Junko Koeda signaled that there could be a rate hike as soon as next month by pointing to the need for normalization, after the yen hit its lowest level in roughly 10 months.】

item.title: 印度中盘股因降息希望而创下历史新高
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行称就业市场过于紧张，无法将通胀保持在目标水平
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行（Reserve Bank）行长助理莎拉-亨特（Sarah Hunter）周四表示，澳大利亚的劳动力市场过于紧张，通胀率无法稳定在央行设定的2-3%的目标范围内，即使决策者们正在努力衡量经济离充分就业还有多远。【原文：Australia’s labor market is too tight for inflation to settle within the central bank’s 2-3% target, Reserve Bank Assistant Governor Sarah Hunter said Thursday, even as policy makers try to gauge how close the economy is to full employment.】

item.title: 桑波埃纳集团将棕榈油业务出售给 Posco International 的 AGPA 公司
item.description: 印度尼西亚桑波埃纳家族已同意将其持有的棕榈油公司 PT Sampoerna Agro 65.7% 的股份出售给 AGPA Pte，具体价格未透露。【原文：Indonesia’s Sampoerna family has agreed to sell its 65.7% stake in palm oil unit PT Sampoerna Agro to AGPA Pte for an undisclosed sum.】

item.title: 菲律宾法院判定前市长因在诈骗中心扮演角色而犯有贩运人口罪
item.description: 在东南亚各国政府誓言打击跨国犯罪集团之际，菲律宾一家法院认定一名前市长犯有有组织贩运人口罪，并判处她终身监禁。【原文：A Philippine court found a former mayor guilty of qualified human trafficking and sentenced her to life imprisonment over her role in setting up a scam center that victimized foreigners, as Southeast Asian governments vow to fight transnational criminal syndicates.】

item.title: 美联储降息押注破灭，债券交易员为就业报告做好准备
item.description: 债券投资者正在关注周四的美国劳动力市场报告，预计该报告将扼杀或重燃美联储下月降息的减弱预期。【原文：Bond investors are zeroing in on Thursday’s US labor market report, which is expected to either kill or rekindle waning expectations for a Federal Reserve interest rate cut next month.】

item.title: 台湾太阳保险公司斥资 5.4 亿美元重振旗鼓
item.description: 玉山金融控股公司（E.Sun Financial Holding Co.）计划注资至少 5 亿美元，以重振其正在收购的一家陷入困境的人寿保险公司，这也是该公司在竞争日益激烈的台湾金融业中崭露头角的雄心壮志的一部分。【原文：E.Sun Financial Holding Co. plans to inject at least half a billion dollars to revive a struggling life insurance firm it is acquiring, as part of its broader ambition to become a more prominent player in Taiwan’s increasingly competitive financial sector.】

item.title: 英伟达黄晓明称公司有大量新芯片可售
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示，该公司有足够的新 Blackwell 芯片来满足日益增长的需求，业务 "非常非常强劲"。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said his company has enough new Blackwell chips to meet increasing demand and that business is “very, very strong.”】

item.title: 为什么澳大利亚人的假期越来越便宜？
item.description:
本周播客：澳大利亚人如何从新西兰当前的经济疲软中获益。【原文：

On this week’s podcast: How Aussies are reaping the benefits from New Zealand’s current economic weakness.

】

item.title: 各大唱片公司与新的人工智能流媒体服务达成协议
item.description: 世界上最大的音乐公司已将其作品授权给一家名为 Klay 的音乐初创公司，该公司正在打造一项流媒体服务，允许用户使用人工智能工具重制歌曲。【原文：The world’s largest music companies have licensed their works to a music startup called Klay, which is building a streaming service that will allow users to remake songs using artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 英伟达财报为科技股带来宽慰，日本股市反弹
item.description: 美国芯片巨头英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Japanese shares rose, rebounding from a four-day losing streak, as AI-related stocks climbed following an upbeat earnings forecast from US chip titan Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 根据即将发布的特朗普命令，各州的人工智能法律将受到挑战
item.description: 根据一份在 K 街和国会山传得沸沸扬扬的、彭博社政府部门也看到的草案，唐纳德-特朗普总统正准备签署一项行政命令，允许司法部就其认为违宪的人工智能法规起诉各州。【原文：President Donald Trump is preparing to sign an executive order that would allow the Department of Justice to sue states over artificial intelligence regulations it deems unconstitutional, according to a draft making the rounds on K Street, Capitol Hill, and seen by Bloomberg Government.】

item.title: 英国零售商协会（BRC）称，里夫斯预算案公布前英国消费者信心下滑
item.description: 英国零售商协会（British Retail Consortium）称，由于政府在本月预算中暗示将提高所得税，导致人们对经济和个人财务状况感到担忧，英国消费者信心在 11 月份出现下滑。【原文：UK consumer confidence tumbled in November, the British Retail Consortium said, as government hints about higher income tax in this month’s budget caused people to worry about the economy and their personal finances.】

item.title: 亚洲降息幅度最大 菲律宾债券将反弹
item.description: 菲律宾债券有望进一步上涨，因为政治不确定性导致投资者预计，与亚洲新兴国家相比，菲律宾将采取最积极的降息措施。【原文：Philippine bonds are poised for further gains as political uncertainties lead investors to anticipate some of the most aggressive interest rate cuts in the nation compared with its emerging Asian peers.】

item.title: 尽管大盘显示出风险偏好，黄金仍在上涨
item.description: 黄金在近期下跌后继续收复失地，表明尽管更广泛的金融市场出现了风险情绪，但对贵金属的需求依然强劲。【原文：Gold continued to claw back losses after its recent drop, showing demand for the precious metal remains strong despite a risk-on mood in wider financial markets.】

item.title: 人工智能需求强劲，联想营收超预期
item.description: 得益于全球个人电脑市场份额的增长和人工智能服务器的强劲需求，联想集团有限公司公布的季度收入好于预期。【原文：Lenovo Group Ltd. posted better-than-expected quarterly revenue thanks to its increased market share in global PCs and robust demand for AI servers.】

item.title: 美国产品库存增加，石油创一周最大跌幅
item.description: 在美国燃料库存增加后，石油创下一周来最大跌幅，同时投资者也在关注定于周五生效的对俄罗斯两大生产商的制裁所带来的影响。【原文：Oil held the biggest decline in a week after US fuel inventories rose, while investors monitor the fallout from sanctions on two major Russian producers that are scheduled to take effect on Friday.】

item.title: 港股反弹面临 250 亿美元禁售挑战
item.description: 香港股市的反弹面临着迫在眉睫的考验，因为年底股票销售限制到期有可能刺激股市波动，促使投资者锁定收益。【原文：Hong Kong’s stock rally faces a looming test, as year-end expirations of share‑sale restrictions threaten to spur volatility and prompt investors to lock in gains.】

item.title: 总部位于密苏里州的中央银行首次公开募股融资 3.734 亿美元
item.description: 拥有地区性贷款机构中央银行的控股公司 Central Bancompany Inc.【原文：Central Bancompany Inc., the holding company that owns regional lender Central Bank, raised $373.4 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares at the bottom of the marketed range.】

item.title: 亚洲的货币防卫战储备已增至 8 万亿美元
item.description: 亚洲的外汇储备已飙升至近 8 万亿美元，这为从东京到孟买的各国当局在需要加强本国货币防卫时提供了充足的弹药。【原文：Asia’s foreign-exchange reserves have surged to almost $8 trillion, providing the authorities from Tokyo to Mumbai with ample ammunition if they need to step up defending their currencies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行监管机构警告海外风险升高
item.description: 澳大利亚银行业监管机构表示，澳大利亚金融体系面临的海外风险加剧，当前的地缘政治动荡仍将持续一段时间。【原文：Risks to Australia’s financial system from overseas are heightened and current geopolitical volatility will remain for some time, according to the nation’s banking regulator.】

item.title: 加密货币混合器联合创始人在洗钱案中被判四年监禁
item.description: 在特朗普政府罕见的加密货币起诉中，一名比特币钱包运营商被指控帮助暗网非法交易洗钱 2 亿多美元，并因此被判四年监禁。【原文：One of the rare cryptocurrency prosecutions under the Trump administration led to a four-year prison term for a bitcoin wallet operator accused of helping launder more than $200 million from illegal dark web transactions.】

item.title: 英伟达预测乐观，美股期货大涨：市场综述
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的强劲财报使美国科技股在盘后交易中走高，延续了华尔街的涨势，并帮助亚洲股市早盘上涨。美元上涨，国债全线下跌。【原文：Robust Nvidia Corp. earnings sent US tech stocks higher in after-market trading, extending a rally on Wall Street and helping set up Asian stocks for early gains. The dollar rose while Treasuries fell across the curve.】

item.title: 英伟达销售预测带来宽慰，人工智能相关股票反弹
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）发布的财报缓解了人们对人工智能热潮持久性的担忧，周三，人工智能领域各公司的股票在延时交易中上涨。【原文：Shares of companies across the artificial intelligence landscape rose in extended trading on Wednesday after Nvidia Corp. reported results that eased concerns about the durability of the AI boom.】
